attributes.action: Start a real in depth investigation to end grooming gangs plaguing the country
attributes.additional_details:
There is nowhere else to turn for a response than the people who should be protecting the citizens of this country, you have a duty of care to this nation. The conservatives failed to address it, now you have the power to make a change.

look at any news site for references, better people than me have done the many hours of horrible work researching this heinous crime spree.
attributes.background: There's a litany of grooming gangs across the UK, the government is aware of them, yet leaves the children of this country at the whim of cruel vindictive criminals. There are enough horrific stories out there, you only need to google grooming gangs to be shown page upon page of nauseating stories.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
